This property contains a font object of the menu and its submenus that don’t specify fonts of their own.

# font

**Instance Property**

The font of the menu and its submenus.

## Declaration

```swift
var font: NSFont! { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property contains a font object of the menu and its submenus that don’t specify fonts of their own.
title: font
